Uses of Class
com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice.transport.ItemHistory

  • Packages that use ItemHistory 
    Package Description
    com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice
    The standard i2 Analyze item history service provides clients with the ability to look at the changes that items have undergone as a result of edit and merge operations. The service also enables clients to examine the differences between two versions of an item.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.

    • Uses of ItemHistory in com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice that return ItemHistory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemHistory IItemHistoryService.retrieveItemHistory(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier, Boundary start, Boundary end, List<VersionChangeType> changeTypes, int maxVersionCount, OverflowPolicy overflowPolicy)
      Retrieves an ItemHistory that contains summary information about the changes that have taken place to the specified Item between two specified points.
